name: SKPaymentTransactionObserver
desc: A set of methods that process transactions, unlock purchased functionality, and continue promoted in-app purchases.

items.name: func paymentQueue(SKPaymentQueue, updatedTransactions: [SKPaymentTransaction])
items.desc: Tells an observer that one or more transactions have been updated.

items.name: func paymentQueue(SKPaymentQueue, removedTransactions: [SKPaymentTransaction])
items.desc: Tells an observer that one or more transactions have been removed from the queue.

items.name: func paymentQueue(SKPaymentQueue, restoreCompletedTransactionsFailedWithError: Error)
items.desc: Tells the observer that an error occurred while restoring transactions.

items.name: func paymentQueueRestoreCompletedTransactionsFinished(SKPaymentQueue)
items.desc: Tells the observer that the payment queue has finished sending restored transactions.

items.name: func paymentQueue(SKPaymentQueue, updatedDownloads: [SKDownload])
items.desc: Tells the observer that the payment queue has updated one or more download objects.

items.name: func paymentQueue(SKPaymentQueue, shouldAddStorePayment: SKPayment, for: SKProduct) -> Bool
items.desc: Tells the observer that a user initiated an in-app purchase from the App Store.

items.name: func paymentQueue(SKPaymentQueue, didRevokeEntitlementsForProductIdentifiers: [String])
items.desc: Tells an observer that the user is no longer entitled to one or more family-shared purchases.

items.name: func paymentQueueDidChangeStorefront(SKPaymentQueue)
items.desc: Tells the observer that the storefront for the payment queue has changed.
